QuestData.Title: Before the Siege
QuestData.Description:
So many years of my life spent studying within the Nighthold...
Never had I considered that I would one day have to fight my way back in.
Time is short. The battle will be upon us soon.
Please, continue our tradition and feed another refugee the fruit of the arcan'dor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Feed the Fruit of the Arcan'dor to a Suramar Refugee in Shal'Aran.
QuestData.RewardText: Just in time. We are ready to begin.
